text:
Hydroxychloroquine on COVID19 as a cure. No virus after 6 days on most patients (24 ppl trial). Similar results in China/South Korea. From French Prof. Didier Raoult at IHU Marseille
His view: diagnose early and treat
https://t.co/ldhCMQdJGv
